Class ChoicesHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • wissim.controller.filters.gui.ChoicesHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, java.util.EventListener, javax.swing.event.TableModelListener

    AdaptiveChoicesHandler, NonAdaptiveChoicesHandler

    abstract class ChoicesHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.swing.event.TableModelListener, java.lang.Runnable

      Sets/unsets the handler on interrupt mode
